views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10

A simple tweak to prevent your iPhone from shutting down or rebooting at an undesirable moment.
Especially convenient while using phone in cold weather

Compatibility: iOS 10.x, tested on 10.3.3 with h3lix JB

WARNING: Do not overuse. The tweak may damage your battery, use it at your own risk.
Software developer declines the responsibility for any damage, caused by using this tweak

Standard usage scenario is like: you charge your iPhone to 75%, go outside (-10 deg. Celsius) and after 5-15 minutes the phone shows 1% and shuts off. Then you go into a warm room and your phone is like: Oh i'm okay there is still 70%. So that's the reason to have an option to block such behavior

No options to configure.
